channel.title: Cna someone code this real fast!
channel.description: on my server i got this chest when u click on it it take u to this place and i wont it to be clan war can some one code it using this coords x:2906 y:3463 or just tell me how to make a team pking area

item.title: Cna someone code this real fast!
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

then you need to set up the wilderness area, and thats not what this thread was asking you to do…

there are plenty of tutorials on how to design a PK area…

in short

In client.java search for CheckWildy and checkwildy2. In those you see ifs and absX and absY use an IF to make certain areas wilderness by setting inwildy and inwildy2 to true.

Read full topic

item.source: Cna someone code this real fast!

item.title: Cna someone code this real fast!
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

you’ll need to get the chest’s object ID…

here’s a code for using the crate in Yanille near the cages to go to a PK area

        if (objectID == 6839) { // Crate - Pk Box
              resetPos();
            teleportToX = 3377; // teleport to top floor X Axis
            teleportToY = 3739; // teleport to top floor Y axis
            heightLevel = 0; // top floor teleport
	    sendMessage("Welcome to the Pk Box.");
            break;
        }

your code would look something like this

        if (objectID == 6839) { // Crate - Pk Box
              resetPos();
            teleportToX = 2906; 
            teleportToY = 3463; 
            heightLevel = 0; 
	    sendMessage("Welcome to the Pk Box.");
            break;
        }

you might have to change the heightLevel

Read full topic
